name: Detonator
description:
Detonator is a memory game written in STOS. A bomb has been discovered aboard your vehicle and it has a color sequence detonator. You will be sent a color combination that you must enter correctly to disable the bomb. The higher the level the more complex the sequence will be.

The screen is divided into two parts: to the left you have the input area which consists of 9 color buttons arranged in a 3 x 3 pattern and to the right is the status display where you see your score, current level and remaining time.

shot.caption: I must remember to press the white button.
